normalized: late that night.
i had snuck into shizuru-san's room in the faculty dormitory right on time.
we were supposed to meet up with yukikaze, who would be responsible for “battles”, and finally discuss our strategy to perform the force infiltration of the washizu material co.
research facility, but――

name: yukikaze
normalized: hey, tatsurou.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wh, what?

name: yukikaze
normalized: what's the meaning of this?

name: tatsurou
normalized: wh, wh, what's the meaning of what…?
shizuru-san and i were sitting side-by-side on the sofa, and yukikaze was sitting in a chair opposite us.
shizuru-san and i, who were the advance unit, were in a perfectly proper sitting position for explaining the situation to yukikaze, who had arrived as a reinforcement.
what wasn't proper was shizuru-san's appearance.

name: shizuru
normalized: ufufu, tatsurou-kuun♪
why was she fresh out of the bath again?!
why was she pressing against me in only a bath towel?!
even though yukikaze was here with us!

name: shizuru
normalized: this isn't particularly odd, is it?
shizuru-san said, while keeping close to me.
being sternly glared at by yukikaze, i became flustered and shuffled to the side.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it is odd!
why are you dressed like that?!

name: shizuru
normalized: because i was having a bath.

name: tatsurou
normalized: and why were you having a bath?!
didn't shizuru-san say the three of us would have a briefing session?!

name: shizuru
normalized: ara, i'm always like this, aren't i?

name: yukikaze
normalized: always?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: th, that's wrong!
it's not true, yukikaze!

name: yukikaze
normalized: what's wrong?

name: tatsurou
normalized: i, i don't like it!
shizuru-san teases me this way as she pleases.
it's not something like that at all!

name: yukikaze
normalized: “something like that”?
yukikaze's eyes were fixed on me.
her hair, which was tied with ribbons, was standing on end slightly, even though there was no wind.
a furious lightning storm (which was not a metaphor, but the anger of a lightning escape user) was spreading through her entire body.
this was tremendously bad.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah… uu…

name: shizuru
normalized: what would “something like that” be, tatsurou-kun?

name: tatsurou
normalized: sh, shizuru-san…
even the culprit, shizuru-san, asked me theatrically.
on top of knowing that i couldn't tell yukikaze honestly.
there was no way i could tell her.
that i had already done it with shizuru-san.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hmm.
you can't say.
and, you're drooling over her pressing against you like that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: looks like this was a pretty enjoyable infiltration mission so far, huh?!
bachibachibachii!

name: tatsurou
normalized: uwaah!
electric sparks surged throughout the room from yukikaze's body.
bonn!
bonn!
several of the electrical appliances it had been furnished with, such as the big-screen tv and recorder, were blown away easily.

name: shizuru
normalized: kyah♪
shizuru-san let out a needlessly cute voice and clung to me.
undoubtedly on purpose.
and then, she asked quietly into my ear,

name: shizuru
normalized: do you really like this girl?
those boobs you love are awfully tiny, aren't they?
while saying so, she kept pressing her huge breasts against me through her bath towel.

name: tatsurou
normalized: p, please get away from me, seriously!
i was about to tear shizuru-san's body off me when, in a whispered voice,

name: shizuru
normalized: are you going to dump me, even though you did something like that to me?

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san?!
p, please stop this right here!

name: shizuru
normalized: and despite that, did something like that to me yesterday, too?

name: tatsurou
normalized: no, what i mean is――
bachii!
bonn!
the microwave oven had spewed flame.

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san, fire!
fire is coming out!
we have to put it out quickly!

name: shizuru
normalized: ara, that's serious.
shizuru-san said, as if it weren't serious at all, then finally went away from me and started to put out the flames with the fire extinguisher she had been provided.

name: tatsurou
normalized: honestly――ugh?!
i became relieved, when suddenly yukikaze, who had stood up, grabbed my collar.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what is that woman?

name: tatsurou
normalized: wh, what, you say?
she's my work partner… guuh!

name: yukikaze
normalized: why is she just out of the bath?
why is she all over you?!
what have you been doing, alone together until now?
you wanna die?
which do you prefer, electrocution or being charred black?

name: tatsurou
normalized: d, don't get the wrong idea.
shizuru-san is nothing to me.
she messes around to tease me.
l, look, it's because i'm a virgin!

normalized: v, virgi――
yukikaze was lost for words, and her cheeks became a little red.

name: yukikaze
normalized: are you an idiot?
yukikaze released me by shoving me down onto the sofa.

name: shizuru
normalized: ara ara, looks like my tv and recorder are broken now.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'll reimburse you.
yukikaze said, like she was in an extremely bad mood.

name: shizuru
normalized: it's okay.
i never used them much.
i'm busy with the mission, and have no time for watching tv.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you have time to mess around with tatsurou.
she said under her breath, loudly enough to be deliberately overheard.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hey, yukikaze!

normalized: what?

name: tatsurou
normalized: n, no… nothing…

name: yukikaze
normalized: hmph.
yukikaze made her mouth into a へ shape, and sat down on her chair again.
shizuru-san made a face that looked like she hadn't heard yukikaze's scathing comment at all, and

name: shizuru
normalized: haah～♪
it's a little hot, don't you think～?
fanned her bath towel in order to tempt me even further in this situation―no, in order to provoke yukikaze.

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san, please put some clothes on!

name: shizuru
normalized: eh～, why?
i'm fine like this, aren't i?

name: tatsurou
normalized: no, you're not fine.
after all, yukikaze is――

name: yukikaze
normalized: i don't really care.
yukikaze flatly interrupted my words.

name: yukikaze
normalized: bath towel or naked, please do as you like.

name: shizuru
normalized: in that case, i will.
tatsurou-kun's fine with that too, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
well, i…

name: yukikaze
normalized: huh?
i what?
there's no problem, is there?
does tatsurou choose how shizuru-san dresses?
it's that kind of relationship, then?
well?

name: tatsurou
normalized: of, of course not!
we don't have a relationship like that!

name: yukikaze
normalized: oh really?
in that case, let's begin the strategy meeting straight away!

name: shizuru
normalized: yeah, that's okay, isn't it?
shizuru-san said, and finally sat down right next to me again, dressed the same as she had been.
wrinkles formed on yukikaze's brow, and the area around her temple twitched.
shizuru-san was making her usual composed smile, without caring about that at all.
i just shrank back in this scene of conflict.
and so, the strategy meeting began.

name: shizuru
normalized: ――anyhow, with support from tatsurou-kun and i, we need mizuki-san to forcibly infiltrate the washizu material co.
research facility.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i have to eliminate obstacles by force, and get to washizu's office, right?

name: shizuru
normalized: right.
then, we want you to search for the reader to decipher these barcodes, and bring it back.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what do i do about the cyborgs?
destroy them all while i'm at it?

name: shizuru
normalized: we won't necessarily need that, but… well, i'll leave that up to you.

name: yukikaze
normalized: understood.
i'll wreck them.

name: shizuru
normalized: after that, there's the rubber woman, who's bound to come out.

name: yukikaze
normalized: we don't really need to determine her true identity, do we?
i'll take her down, too.

name: shizuru
normalized: strong will to fight, eh?
but don't forget that your objective is the barcode reader.

name: yukikaze
normalized: of course.
i'm not an idiot.

name: shizuru
normalized: sorry.
just making sure.

name: yukikaze
normalized: oh, is that so?
thank you for the advice.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （uu… this tense atmosphere…）
yukikaze didn't even try to hide her displeasure.
shizuru-san didn't mind that at all.
i was lying on a bed of nails, so i couldn't interject.
as a result, with them ignoring each other's emotions, the briefing session proceeded frighteningly smoothly.

name: shizuru
normalized: does tatsurou-kun not have anything to say?
he's been quiet for a while.

name: yukikaze
normalized: now that you mention it, he has.
how about saying something?
the two beautiful women both looked at me together.
i swallowed my saliva, and finally let out my voice.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i, i think that's fine.
the strategy you two talked about would be best, wouldn't it…?

name: shizuru
normalized: thanks.

name: yukikaze
normalized: fence-sitter.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （uuh…）
shizuru-san smiled pleasantly.
yukikaze pierced me with daggers of cynicism.

name: tatsurou
normalized: s, so… we have to decide when to carry out the force infiltration…

name: yukikaze
normalized: huh?
isn't it obvious we'd do that immediately?
what, tatsurou, do you want to stay in a place like this forever?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
well, i don't mean that, but…

name: yukikaze
normalized: in that case, we'll carry it out at once, get the mission over with, and go back to the village together.
okay, tatsurou?
yukikaze asserted, facing me alone, without looking at shizuru-san at all.

name: shizuru
normalized: i can not support that.
shizuru-san politely raised an objection.

name: yukikaze
normalized: why's that?!
yukikaze glared at shizuru-san with frightening eyes.
however, like before, shizuru-san peered only in my direction, without looking at yukikaze at all, and argued

name: shizuru
normalized: carrying it out immediately after mizuki-san has moved in would be suspicious.
i think it would be better to carry it out after a little more time.

name: yukikaze
normalized: even if it is really suspicious, that's fine, isn't it?
after all, once this is over, we'll all escape.
whether we're suspected after that doesn't matter.
isn't that so, tatsurou?

name: shizuru
normalized: that's not true.
if we're taimanin, we should think about finishing the mission without leaving even a trace of suspicion behind.
isn't that right, tatsurou-kun?

name: yukikaze
normalized: they're already suspicious, thanks to a pair of careless people.

name: shizuru
normalized: that's precisely why more prudence is called for in the mission from here on.
is that not true?
wh, why…?!
why are they both just looking at and talking to me?!
what do i say, in this 『which will you choose?
』 kind of situation?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: （uu… but, personally, i'm thinking yukikaze's plan…）
what shizuru-san was saying made sense, as you would expect from a veteran taimanin, but all the same, it would be safer to keep the time we stayed in enemy territory short.
if we stayed hidden for a long time so that yukikaze wouldn't be suspected, it stood to reason that the risk of our true identities being discovered would rise because of that.
or perhaps i should say, the three of us remaining in this place for long seemed like it would eat a hole in my stomach.
to put it frankly, i wanted to get the mission over with already.
and i wanted to make the matter with shizuru-san just a good memory after the mission.
before it was known to yukikaze.
however, seeming to have sensed those feelings of mine, shizuru-san whispered into my ear.

name: shizuru
normalized: i wonder if tatsurou-kun and i should let this girl know about our relationship?

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha…?!
i looked at shizuru-san in horror.
and there was a woman making devilish eyes, which she had never shown me before.
my entire body huddled up, as if she had grabbed tight hold of my cock all of a sudden.

name: shizuru
normalized: is that okay?

name: yukikaze
normalized: i want you to stop these secret conversations!
yukikaze said, theatrically.
her eyes were blatantly suspicious of the relationship between me and shizuru-san.
this was bad.
i absolutely could not afford for that to be exposed.

name: tatsurou
normalized: a, all in all… i suppose it wouldn't be good to do it right after yukikaze's moved in, would it…?
if possible, we should take a little more ti――

name: yukikaze
normalized: oh, really?!
yukikaze stood up in anger before i could finish speaking.

name: yukikaze
normalized: in that case, there's nothing more to talk about today, is there?!
you two can make out together all you want!
good night!
saying so over her shoulder, yukikaze opened the bedroom window with practically enough force to smash it to pieces, and jumped out without displaying even a moment's hesitation.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze, wait a sec!
i was about to chase after her in a panic, but shizuru-san promptly grabbed my arm.

name: shizuru
normalized: what do you think you're doing, leaving together?
splitting up when you disperse is a fundamental of infiltration missions, you know?

name: tatsurou
normalized: th, that's true, but…

name: shizuru
normalized: she did say, make out all you want.
let's do that, okay?
as shizuru-san let out a seductive voice, she tried to guide my hand, which she had grasped, to her groin.

name: tatsurou
normalized: p, please excuse me today…!
even i couldn't think about doing it with shizuru-san in a situation like this.
i shook off shizuru-san's hand, and literally ran away from the room.
via a place other than the window through which yukikaze had left, in accordance with the fundamentals of an infiltration mission.
